'''Rikard Herlitz''' is the former chief technology officer at [[Mojang Studios]]. He joined the company on September 27, 2016, after founding and working as the CTO of Goo Create.<ref>{{tweet|GooCoder|780736196930600961|After 5yrs of WebGL, founding+running Goo, it's time for new adventures! Starting off with @Mojang contracting. Back home to C++/voxels :P|September 27, 2016}}</ref> On November 10, 2018, Herlitz announced that he was departing from the company, due to him securing the position of Engineering Director for Hangouts Meet in Stockholm.<ref name=departure>https://www.linkedin.com/feed/update/urn:li:activity:6467801091781332992/?commentUrn=urn%3Ali%3Acomment%3A(activity%3A6467095662101176321%2C6467800993332629504) LinkedIn Update</ref>
